lead_paragraph: A 201-pound heavyweight, the 6-foot-7 Deontay Wilder has a 34½-inch reach and a powerful right hand. He won the 2007 United States championship.
snippet: A 201-pound heavyweight, the 6-foot-7 Deontay Wilder has a 34½-inch reach and a powerful right hand. He won the 2007 United States championship.
